channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: In the Cotswolds, Nicki Chapman and a couple from Scotland don't need to look too far to find the characterful cottage of their dreams for a ?600,000 budget. While in the region, Nicki drops in on show jumping legend and double Olympic gold medallist Nick Skelton and his sons, Harry and Dan, who are following in their father's 'hoof' steps.
